# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)).

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)).

### Water supply system
Consists of offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)), pipe group (fluid system 4886, position (107.5, -34.5)), and boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)).

### Steam power system
Consists of boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), and pipe group (fluid system 4890, position (117.5, -34.5)).

### Electricity distribution system
Consists of small electric pole (position (119.5, -30.5)) and electricity group (id 255).

### Belt transport system
Consists of two belts: Belt ((63.5, -52.5) -> (63.5, -54.5), direction UP) and Belt ((64.5, -52.5) -> (64.5, -54.5), direction UP).

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into boiler
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the boiler.
- Check the boiler's fuel status and add fuel if necessary.

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is properly connected to the pipe group and boiler.
- Check the fluid box and fluid systems of the offshore pump for any issues.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine is properly connected to the pipe group and boiler.
- Check the fluid box and fluid systems of the steam engine for any issues.

### Errors when using electricity distribution system
- Ensure the small electric pole is properly connected to the electricity group.
- Check the voltage and poles of the electricity group for any issues.

# NAMESPACE
- No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
- Important variables:
  - `transport-belt`: 8
  - `small-electric-pole`: 1
  - `wood`: 7
  - `iron-ore`: 10
  - `copper-ore`: 10
  - `iron-plate`: 7
  - `copper-plate`: 5
  - `copper-cable`: 2
  - `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
